extendedInfo.description: Join the millions of people already having a blast humiliating their friends with hilarious photo captions. Capify by CapZilla only drops the most funny, most modern, most edgy photo captions on your pics!!"Freakin hilarious captions!!" - Talk Androids"Photo Captions are funny as hell" - College Humor Magazine"Best photo caption app on the market" - Times10 Reasons you need this app!1. Choose your photo from the library or snap a new picture2. Most original and most funny captions on the market3. Hundreds of photo captions for hours of fun4. PhotoScan Technology matches the funniest caption with your photo5. Drag-n-drop the captions around for effect6. Edit the caption or create your own7. Top and bottom MEME style photo captions 8. Share your captioned photo on Facebook, Twitter -OR- save it to your library for later.9. Chuck Norris and Most Interesting Man in the World captions!10. Best usability of all MEME style caption apps. We blow the competition away!Give this app a download - we promise you will not be disappointed.

reviews.title: Dafuq
reviews.comment: This app is trash... Gives you a few options and only let\'s you use them a couple times. Freezes up constantly. Uninstalled...
reviews.author: Stephians Hensley

reviews.title: Can\'t create your own....
reviews.comment: You can\'t create your own captions for free you have  to pay 00.99 cents for it!! Uninstalling....Please fix this and I will install again.
reviews.author: Isabel Espejo

reviews.title: Funny, but restricted
reviews.comment: I thought the captions were fu.ny but annoying that u can only go tgrough.3 at a time. Also.when I.upload there is always a black.box / frame in the middle of the.picture so looking.for better app
reviews.author: Jess Reese

reviews.title: Faild to launch
reviews.comment: Though i was looking forward to this app after downloading it on my galaxy note 2 but alas every time i load a pic from galary it jams and stops.
reviews.author: Abdul Raisi

reviews.title: Waste!
reviews.comment: You have to pay to do anything! This app is crap!
reviews.author: rene martinez

reviews.title: Joey
reviews.comment: It was not a good app it wouldn\'t even let me put the photo on there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost 5 stars...
reviews.comment: Squares off your picture, had one I was trying to do but was pointless as you cant position pic or resize.
reviews.author: mark bonnar

reviews.title: Makes photos hilarious
reviews.comment: I have friends and family laughing to tears with these captions.
reviews.author: Jeremy Granger

reviews.title: Have to pay to upload pix w/ captions.
reviews.comment: Also named capzilla. Not my taste of humor. Not only are u limited on what the other reviews say but your photo caption gets blacked out by the app. Way to cawk block us brah.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: You have to pay to write your own caption, theres 1000 other APs that allow it for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: crashes on galaxy 3

reviews.comment: Can\'t write own comments.. crap

reviews.comment: If I could give it 0 stars I would it doesn\'t let me do anything

reviews.title: Fix and I\'ll give 5 stars.
reviews.comment: I\'m willing to pay $ .99 for the pro version if only I could.

reviews.comment: There has to be another similar app better than this trash.

reviews.title: 0 stars!
reviews.comment: You have to purchase the app to actually use ur own captions. Just say that on the Play Store page and I wouldn\'t have wasted my time downloading it.

reviews.title: Can\'t write your own captions unless you pay!
reviews.comment: The most stupid \"free\" thing I\'ve ever seen on the Google Market.
